body:
## Description

- Linked people to contacts (specifically emails) following the [Figma design](https://www.figma.com/design/SYtMyLBs5SAOkTbfMMzhqt/Ente-Visual-Design?node-id=34500-35963&t=viuppN9KWwcHHWI5-4).
- Enabled the "joining public links" feature.
Reverted to Flutter version 3.24.3 due to a bug introduced in version 3.27.x.

## Tests

Did basic QA and code review myself.
